53.eng-name: The Book of Paradise, its Description, its Bounties and its Inhabitants

hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik reported that Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) said that the Hell would continue to say:Is there anything more, until Allah, the Exalted and High, would place His foot therein and that would say: Enough, enough, by Your Honour, and some parts of it would draw close to the other

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّارُ يَدْخُلُهَا الْجَبَّارُونَ وَالْجَنَّةُ يَدْخُلُهَا الضُّعَفَاءُ
chapter.eng-name: The Arrogant Will Enter The Fire, And The Humble Will Enter Paradise
